simple_stories.title: The Little Cat
simple_stories.text: Mimi is a small black cat. She likes to play with a red ball. Every morning, Mimi drinks milk and eats fish. She sleeps in a cozy basket by the window. Mimi loves sunny days because she can sit in the warm sunlight.

simple_stories.title: Going to the Park
simple_stories.text: Emma and her mom went to the park. They brought sandwiches for lunch. Emma played on the swings and went down the slide. She saw ducks in the pond and fed them bread crumbs. After playing, Emma and her mom sat under a big tree and ate their lunch.

simple_stories.title: The Magic Garden
simple_stories.text: Ben planted seeds in his garden. He watered them every day and waited. After a week, green shoots appeared. Ben was so excited! The plants grew bigger and bigger. Soon there were beautiful flowers of many colors. Ben's mom said his garden was magical because he took such good care of it.

simple_stories.title: The Birthday Surprise
simple_stories.text: Today is Lucy's birthday. Her family planned a surprise party. They decorated the house with balloons and streamers. Lucy's friends came over with presents. They played games and ate chocolate cake. Lucy blew out seven candles and made a wish. It was the best birthday ever!

simple_stories.title: The Friendly Dog
simple_stories.text: Max is a big brown dog who lives next door. He has a long tail that wags when he's happy. Every morning, Max barks hello to the mailman. He loves to chase butterflies in the yard. When children walk by, Max sits and waits for them to pet him. He is the friendliest dog on the street.

simple_stories.title: Making Cookies
simple_stories.text: Anna helps her grandma make cookies. First, they mix flour, sugar, and eggs in a big bowl. Anna gets to crack the eggs carefully. Then they roll the dough and use cookie cutters to make fun shapes. They put the cookies in the oven and wait. Soon the kitchen smells wonderful! The warm cookies taste delicious.

simple_stories.title: The Rainy Day
simple_stories.text: It was raining outside, so Sam couldn't go to the playground. He felt sad at first. Then his mom gave him paper and crayons. Sam drew pictures of the sun, his family, and his favorite toys. He made a rainbow with all the colors. When the rain stopped, Sam showed his pictures to his dad. His dad said they were beautiful!

simple_stories.title: The Lost Teddy Bear
simple_stories.text: Lily took her teddy bear, Mr. Buttons, everywhere. One day at the grocery store, she forgot him in the cart. At bedtime, Lily couldn't find Mr. Buttons anywhere. She looked under her bed and in her toy box. Lily started to cry. Her dad called the store, and they found Mr. Buttons! The next day, they picked him up. Lily hugged him tight and promised never to lose him again.

simple_stories.title: The School Bus
simple_stories.text: Every morning, Jake waits for the big yellow school bus. Mrs. Rose is the friendly bus driver. She always smiles and says good morning to all the children. Jake sits with his friend Tommy. They look out the window and count the red cars they see. When they arrive at school, Mrs. Rose says, 'Have a great day!' Jake loves riding the school bus.

simple_stories.title: The New Baby Chick
simple_stories.text: On the farm, Farmer Joe found a tiny yellow chick. The chick had just hatched from its egg. It was small and fluffy. The chick was looking for its mommy. Farmer Joe helped the chick find the mother hen. The mother hen was so happy to see her baby! She kept the chick warm under her wings. The chick peeped softly and felt safe.
